author: James Reborn
content:
If you’re here because of the Fusion cheating drama, I’m sharing the full story elsewhere since I don’t want to post it in this Discord. If you’re interested, join here to see the complete story: https://discord.gg/sNjPjuY9sh
This is a server related to the cheating drama with me on Fusion. It contains some NSFW content, so children are not permitted to join.

author: James Reborn
content:
* Added Local Protection Avi To Fusion UI Element [ When pressed user for your screen only will switch to polyblank ]
* Fixed some bugs
* Added Clear Log Buttons
* Added Godmode
* Added Ban Steam ID From Your Lobby
* Added Emergency Escape Hold Y+B For a few seconds to teleport to spawn
* Added Anti Knockout
* Added Private Profile Check To Alt Prevention
* Fixed A Bunch Of Issues
* Unlimited Ammo
* Anti Self Constraints
Note: All options like godmode, inv ammo, etc., will not work in gamemodes so they cannot be abused.

author: James Reborn

author: James Reborn
content:
* Added Fusion UI Elements In Yellow
* Ban From Your Lobbies
 UnBan From Your Lobbies
 Copy All Profile To Clipboard
 Copy Steam ID
 Open Steam Profile
 Improved Alt Prevention
* Added Alt Detection Notifications [ Works When Not Host ]
* Made alt remover better you don't need to be just host if you have sufficient permission level to kick or ban it will work [so you can help moderate a friends or anyone else's lobby]
* Added Option To Alt Prevention * "[Perms Only] Alt Teleport To You" [if you disable alt remover and enable this it will only tp the player to you when it detects a alt to like speak with them and etc... ]
* Added Spoof Profile Notifications [alerts you when a user joins that spoofed there profile]
* Also improved alt prevention notifications they stick to fusion ui now
* Added Clone Exploit Notifications [this will search all active fusion players and see if the person joined cloned any of them and then if they did boom you know it]
* Added Spawnable Warn/Block Page [you can block spawnables / warn them ]
* Fixed a few bugs also improved spawnlogs/avatar logs
Updated! Redownload to get update!

author: James Reborn
content: Fusion Protector is meant to protect everyone from the Montana client. I’m sorry I ever released it. I thought I could control the outcome by adding banning and other features, but it wasn’t doing much. I will be taking a break. Enjoy Fusion, use the Protector, and report anyone using the client or abusing it. Stay safe!
